metadataAttributes.Title: The Art of Visual Storytelling Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Introduction to Video Production. At the completion of this specialization, you will understand video production workflow, how to structure and write visual stories, the kinds of technology you can use to enhance your production, how to choose the best shots for the edit, the fundamentals of non-linear editing, and how to produce video that meets professional standards.
metadataAttributes.Skills: scripting, visual storytelling, Graphics, Videography, Editing, Video Editing, Linear Editing, Video Production, video pre-production, Framing, Storytelling, video,
